title: Supplemental Exam 1 2024
description: Mock exam aligned to Unit 1 style: SIG translations (Latin ↔ English), core conversions, and calculation items from Chapters 1–4. Short-answer with hints and stepwise solutions.

easy.question: Latin → English: p.o. q.d.
hints: p.o. = by mouth; q.d. = once daily.

easy.question: English → Latin: Take 1 tablet by mouth twice daily as needed for pain.
answer: i tab p.o. b.i.d. p.r.n. pain
one tablet p.o. b.i.d. p.r.n. pain
hints: i = one; b.i.d. = twice daily; p.r.n. = as needed.
easy.solution: i tab p.o. b.i.d. p.r.n. pain.
